title: As Film Stocks Dwindle, Movie-Makers Weigh What May Soon Be Lost
teaser: Film isn't dead â€” not yet, at least. Kodak recently announced that it will keep making film stock for motion pictures despite a dramatic drop in sales, after a handful of high-profile directors advocated for it. But, since the medium's days may yet be numbered, it's worth asking what film can offer that digital media can't.
